Release notes release/0.8
=========================

Released 2018-05-11

Changes
~~~~~~~

-  Merge pull request #66 from miraculixx/patrick/fix-masked-filter
   `6570bd3 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/6570bd3>`__
-  variuos performance improvements add job slides viewer fix large
   scale insertion timeout make masked-alike dataframe filtering work
   masked filters dataframe-style now work
   `982b736 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/982b736>`__
-  variuos performance improvements add job slides viewer fix large
   scale insertion timeout
   `34ee3e2 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/34ee3e2>`__
-  Merge pull request #64 from
   miraculixx/patrick/various-performance-updates
   `614c3bd <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/614c3bd>`__
-  variuos performance improvements
   `25c3c02 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/25c3c02>`__
-  Merge pull request #63 from miraculixx/patrick/add-streaming-tutorial
   `774507e <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/774507e>`__
-  Merge pull request #62 from miraculixx/patrick/improve-numpy-support
   `6e6b4bd <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/6e6b4bd>`__
-  add minibatch/streaming tutorial
   `20d18d2 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/20d18d2>`__
-  improved sklearn, pandas and numpy support for position indexables
   `4bf0cf2 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/4bf0cf2>`__
